name: Cat Planet
storyline: You play as a human girl with wings, and the last of your kind, and you must collect all the cats on the cat planet. While the controls are somewhat bizarre, in that any key will allow you to take flight, holding 'up' will increase your altitude, and holding 'down' will decrease it. While you can die, there are no game overs. However, you can't save, so the game must be beaten in one go!
summary: A 2D platformer featuring an angel that must explore a planet full of cats.
